UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY FOR CLARET LOVERS

Sparked by the hysteria that surrounds the 1959 vintage and a dramatic increase in the world demand for the great wines of Bor- deaux, prices at the vineyards continue to march up substantially. Despite this, we have priced our clarets to reflect our original costs and not what the present market should dic. tate. As our inventory becomes depleted, we will, of course, be forced to reflect the re- placement prices which will be much higher. As of now, we do think it would be wise to anticipate your red Bordeaux requirements right into the Fall and avail yourselves of these unique values.
